HardSkills.title: HARD SKILLS
HardSkills.introBody: Hi, I'm <name>Cyril De Graeve</name>. Formerly a cyberculture journalist, passionate about machines and networks for as long as I can remember, I’ve been a freelance Full-Stack developer for 5 years.
HardSkills.hook1: Want a fun, fast site that converts  ?
HardSkills.body1: I build modern web experiences (Next/React) with style, performance, and solid SEO.
HardSkills.hook2: And you want it to hold up in production  ?
HardSkills.body2: Clean deployments, strong business logic, and a slightly obsessive attention to detail.

dossier.title: Technical dossier
dossier.body: To see more details about my projects (context, stack, technical choices, deliverables), you can check my Technical Dossier.

jffourcade.title: Librairie J.-F. Fourcade
jffourcade.desc: Full redesign of the bookstore website. Rare-books e-commerce implementation: catalog, advanced search. Custom back office.

genAIbooks.title: Book Sheet Assistant (GenAI)
genAIbooks.desc: Full-stack Next.js app that automatically generates product copy, SEO, newsletter, review and translation from text or a scanned photo (OCR).

lps.title: Librairie Pierre Saunier
lps.desc: Complete Next.js rebuild (front + back) + e-commerce: catalog, advanced search, cart, Stripe payments, custom back office and MySQL migration.

serious.title: Serious Publishing
serious.desc: Migration from a PHP/MySQL site to a modern web app: Next/React front, Node/Express API, PostgreSQL, shop and Stripe payments.

clairios.title: Clairios
clairios.desc: Modern conversion-focused marketing site: clean UI, accessibility, technical SEO and VPS deployment.

sajinstudio.title: Sajin Studio
sajinstudio.desc: Web app to manage and share event photos: events, gallery, secure uploads, sharing and admin.

codeberry.title: Codeberry
codeberry.desc: SaaS MVP: Jira integration (API), ticket retrieval/display and server-side automations (Next.js, Supabase/Drizzle, Server Actions).

artificiallifecoach.title: Artificial Life Coach
artificiallifecoach.desc: AI life coach + interactive calendar: recommendations, calendar actions, OpenAI API, Node/Express backend and PostgreSQL.

telegraphe.title: Télégraphe
telegraphe.desc: Local platform: reviews, ratings, auth, interactive map (Google Maps) and community content — responsive.

jadopte.title: I Adopt a Human
jadopte.desc: Final training project: matching, roles/permissions, JWT auth, security (BCrypt) and REST API. Backlog, user stories, Scrum rituals, team coordination (5 devs).

donefficace.title: Effective Giving
donefficace.desc: i18n (i18next), integration/editing via Sanity, GDPR compliance and collaboration within an international team.

hyperfree.title: Hyper-Free
hyperfree.desc: Packaged offer platform (dev + copywriting): content, structure, conversion. FR/EN internationalization + reusable components and responsive design.

testimonial1.name: Filo S.
testimonial1.message: This is the second mission I've entrusted to Cyril. He rebuilt the front-end of my site, and he has now also rebuilt the entire back-end. His full-stack skills are incredible!

testimonial2.name: Emmanuel P.
testimonial2.message: A very solid project delivered efficiently and quickly by Cyril to meet a specific and urgent business need. The result exceeded the initial expectations! I highly recommend this developer.

testimonial3.name: Christel M.
testimonial3.message: Cyril managed to bring creative ideas to help me stand out from other existing websites. He meets deadlines, stays involved, and I was kept informed at every step.

testimonial4.name: Josselin G.
testimonial4.message: Great contact with Cyril, very professional. Strong support in choosing the visual direction for my website. Very satisfied with the work delivered.

testimonial5.name: Alejandrina C.
testimonial5.role: President of the Effective Giving endowment fund
testimonial5.message: Cyril, who was very open to feedback, well organized and autonomous, is someone it’s a pleasure to work with. We highly recommend him and we’ll work with him again in the future.

testimonial6.name: The jury
testimonial6.role: Professional certification: Web & Mobile Web Developer
testimonial6.message: Congratulations Cyril on earning your certification! You showed strong maturity as a developer and you have the soft skills needed to succeed as a freelancer.

Game.title: LET’S PLAY  !
Game.message: Ok, break time. A quick tic-tac-toe. You play X, I play O. And I’m not nice.

1.title: Writing & editorial
1.desc: Strong editorial background: writing, rewriting, FR/EN.
1.example: 20 years in journalism + editor-in-chief for a media outlet (team ~40).

2.title: Autonomy
2.desc: I make decisions and move fast, without losing the frame.
2.example: I propose clear options, anticipate risks/impact, and deliver.

3.title: Curiosity & monitoring
3.desc: I track product, tech and user trends.
3.example: I test, filter, then integrate what brings real value.

4.title: Social & web culture
4.desc: Good understanding of distribution and attention dynamics.

5.title: Flexibility
5.desc: Comfortable in remote setups, flexible hours if needed.
5.example: Smooth coordination with clients/teams across schedules.

6.title: Geek culture
6.desc: Movies, video games, cyberpunk: I speak “product” and “universe”.
6.example: It helps me create fun, readable and consistent interfaces.

7.title: Human (and animals)
7.desc: Tech + empathy: I like systems… and living beings.
7.example: I listen, reframe, and keep user impact at the center.

8.title: Strengths & clarity
8.desc: Meticulous, reliable, curious — and comfortable with feedback.
8.example: I fix fast, learn continuously, and document.

Contact.title: CONTACT
Contact.intro: Ready to build something amazing together? Please leave a message so I can understand your needs for building, redesigning and optimizing websites, SaaS products and applications (web and mobile), both front-end and back-end. Feel free to check my social profiles as well as marketplaces like Malt or Codeur, where I offer my services.
Contact.error: Oops. Sending failed. Try again or email me.

form.name: Name
form.rgpd: I agree that my data may be used to contact me in response to my request.
